import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Splide, SplideSlide } from "@splidejs/react-splide"; import kep1 from "../img/album/20200204_113822.jpg"; import kep2 from "../img/album/20200204_113950.jpg"; import kep3 from "../img/album/20200204_114059.jpg"; class SliderComponent extends Component { render() { const primaryOptions = { autoplay: true, interval: 400, type: "fade", heightRatio: 0.5, pagination: false, arrows: true, cover: false, }; const secondaryOptions = { autoplay: true, interval: 400, rewind: true, fixedWidth: "32% !important", fixedHeight: "150px", isNavigation: true, gap: 10, focus: "center", pagination: false, cover: true, breakpoints: { 600: { fixedWidth: 66, fixedHeight: 40, }, }, }.mount(); primarySlider.sync(secondarySlider).mount(); return (
); } } export default SliderComponent;
